task_description: Proje temel yapısını ve dosya organizasyonunu oluştur

patterns.configuration_pattern: Uses Python dataclasses with @dataclass decorator and field(default_factory=...) for nested configs
patterns.environment_loading: Config.from_env() classmethod loads values from os.getenv() with sensible defaults
patterns.logging_pattern: setup_logger() function with get_logger(name) for child loggers, outputs to stdout
patterns.type_hints: All functions and methods use Python type hints (-> return_type, : param_type)
patterns.docstrings: Google-style docstrings with Args: and Returns: sections
patterns.async_pattern: Uses asyncio with @wraps decorator for retry logic and RateLimiter class
patterns.frame_encoding: OpenCV frames encoded to base64 via PIL Image for API compatibility

existing_implementations.description: All files already exist with complete implementations

investigation_notes.quality_assessment: High - all files have type hints, docstrings, and follow consistent patterns
investigation_notes.focus: Verification of existing implementation rather than creation
